Innovative non-invasive Plasma Skin Tightening procedure. 

FUSION PLASMA 
2-IN-1 
This device produces WARM PLASMA (Thermal) & COLD PLASMA (Non-Thermal). The Device comes with two separate hand pieces.

WARM PLASMA - A plasma arc arises when high frequency energy ionizes the gas in the air.  Sublimation occurs at a lower temperature than the traditional fibroblast plasma arc.  There is a fluttering spray of plasma that flutters over the epidermis and creates tiny pale white dots throughout the treated area. The damage to the epidermis is minimal as the energy created reaches
directly at cellular level.  Although thermal energy is produced, the plasma energy cools down very quickly as it reaches cellular level resulting in minimum discomfort and surface injury. Treatments are quick with little to no downtime. Warm Plasma treatment is great for:
Non Surgical Blepharoplasty
Skin Tightening
Fine line & Wrinkles
Acne Scars
Stretch Marks
Hyperpigmentation 
Skin Rejuvenation & more

COLD PLASMA also known as (Cold Atmospheric Plasma)CAP.  Has been used for many years for its antibacterial effect,fungi-destroying feature and virus inactivation due to the photon and ozone it produces.  It provides a very strong ozonation and sterilization where it is applied, without using any chemicals and producing no heat. It’s cold to the touch.  Effects on the skin provides ozonation of the skin
disinfects the skin and provides sterilization.
It promotes healing and relieves skin without pain, heat sensation, redness, swelling, crusting or any side effects.  Cold plasma is great for:
Wound Healing
Skin Disinfection
Body Odor
Excessive Sweating
Kills Bacteria & Fungus
Relives Skin Irritation 
Active Acne & More…

Fusion Plasma Beverly Hills
#ColdPlasma
The latest buzzword in the beauty and aesthetic industry is COLD PLASMA.
 •
What is Cold Plasma?
According to physics, there is only one COLD Atmospheric Plasma CAD (Non-Thermal) and it must be produced by using conductive gas support like Helium, Argon, Neon, Hydrogen, etc. to cool the plasma.  Our device uses Helium (purchased separately). Devices that don’t connect to an inert gas are not really Cold Plasma. They are thermal (Hot) plasma. 
For many years, Cold Plasma has been used for its antibacterial effect, fungi-destroying feature and virus inactivation due to the photon and ozone it produces. It provides a very strong ozonation and sterilization in the environment where it is applied, without using any chemicals and doesn’t produce any heat. It’s cold to the touch and produces ozonation of the skin, disinfects the skin and provides sterilization.great treatment for testing acne, cold sores, toe fungus, eczema, psoriasis. Cold plasma increases product absorption and is also used for thinning hair. Cold Plasma promotes healing and relieves the skin without pain, heat sensation, redness, swelling, crusting or any other side effects. Cold Plasma can be used immediately after the Warm Plasma treatment to help with inflammation, kill bacteria and induce healing.

What skin types can be treated with cold plasma?
All skin types.
Is there any downtime?
No downtime?
•

Non-ablative cold plasma treatments are the emerging trend for non-invasive and painless plasma-based skin rejuvenation. Aside from reducing the risk of side effects and downtime associated with ablative treatments, non-ablative plasma treatments use controlled plasma-containing energy to targeted skin areas without damaging it. The generated energy, or activated ionized gas, is emitted to the dermis skin layer in micro-pulses, triggering the body’s wound-healing response to promote new collagen growth.
Benefits of non-ablative cold plasma treatment:

Reduced surface-level skin bacteria & harmful microbes
In a past breakthrough experiment, a mere 2-minute treatment of cold atmospheric plasma was seen to decrease 40% of the bacterial load in plasma-treated wounds, regardless of the species of bacteria. Plasma energy destroys the cell membrane, DNA and protein of pore-dwelling bacteria that causes common skin problems such as acne, allergic dermatitis, and eczema.

Increased absorption of vital skincare ingredients
Plasma technology instantly activates the epidermal cells of the skin with high amounts of energy, which increases the skin’s hydrophilicity – in other words, the ability to absorb water. This means water-soluble substances such as molecules of vitamin B, vitamin C and various peptides are more likely to be absorbed through the skin.

Visible anti-aging results
Active nitrogen and oxygen ions can easily pass through pores and enter the deeper layers of skin, catalyzing the regeneration of fibroblasts. This stimulates the production of collagen, elastin and hyaluronic acid, effectively reducing fine lines and wrinkles caused by photodamage and aging. Additionally, plasma technology boosts cell turnover to strengthen skin elasticity, and to improve uneven skin tones and pigmentation.

The best thing about non-ablative cold plasma technology is that it benefits every skin type and condition. The innovative treatment can be done safely, comfortably and painlessly without downtime. #fibroblast #coldplasma #coldarc #jetplasma

Cold Plasma treatment for nail fungus.

This is just one of many amazing treatments that cold plasma can perform. 

Safe & effective:

On top of making the area inconducive for their survival, the cold plasma creates a mix of ions and excited chemical species that kill the fungi and disinfect the toe.

Procedimiento innovador de estiramiento cutáneo con plasma no invasivo.

PLASMA DE FUSIÓN BEVERLY HILLS
 2 EN 1
•
Este dispositivo produce PLASMA CALIENTE (térmico) y PLASMA FRÍO (no térmico). El dispositivo viene con dos piezas de mano separadas.

WARM PLASMA (PLASMA TIBIO)- Un arco de plasma surge cuando la energía de alta frecuencia ioniza el gas en el aire. La sublimación se produce a una temperatura más baja que el arco de plasma de fibroblastos tradicional. Hay un rocío de plasma que revolotea sobre la epidermis y crea pequeños puntos de color blanco pálido en toda el área tratada. El daño a la epidermis es mínimo ya que la energía creada alcanza directamente a nivel celular.
Aunque se produce energía térmica, la energía del plasma se enfría muy rápidamente a medida que alcanza el nivel celular, lo que genera una incomodidad mínima y lesiones en la superficie. 
Los tratamientos son rápidos con poco o ningún tiempo de inactividad.
El tratamiento WARM PLASMA es ideal para:

-Rejuvenicimiento cutaneo no invasivo de restro y cuerpo
-Blefaroplastia no quirúrgica de parparos superiores
-Líneas finas y arrugas
-Cicatrices de acné
-Estrías de la piel
-Hiperpigmentación
-Rejuvenecimiento de la piel y más

PLASMA FRÍO también conocido como (Plasma Atmosférico Frío)
Se ha utilizado durante muchos años por su efecto antibacteriano, función de destrucción de hongos e inactivación de virus debido al fotón y al ozono que produce.
Proporciona una ozonización y esterilización muy fuerte donde se aplica, sin utilizar ningún producto químico y sin producir calor. Es frío al tacto. Efectos sobre la piel proporciona ozonización de la piel desinfecta la piel y proporciona esterilización.Promueve la curación y alivia la piel sin dolor, sensación de calor, enrojecimiento, hinchazón, formación de costras o efectos secundarios. 

El plasma frío es ideal para:
-Ayuda a inducir la cicatrización de heridas o tratamientos de la piel.

What is the technology behind FUSION PLASMA treatment?

Using a plasma arc to sublimate the epidermis involves creating a small electrical arc that is created between the device and the skin's surface. This electrical arc is then released onto the skin, creating a controlled thermal effect that sublimates a microscopic layer of the epidermis. The process of sublimation occurs when a solid substance is heated and transformed directly into a gas without passing through a liquid phase.

This controlled sublimation of the epidermis leads to a number of positive effects, such as increased collagen production and skin rejuvenation. The thermal effect from the plasma arc stimulates the skin's fibroblast cells, which then produce new collagen and elastin fibers, effectively strengthening and tightening the skin. Additionally, the sublimation of the surface layer of the skin leads to a gentle exfoliation process, removing impurities and dead cells on the surface of the skin.

Overall, plasma arc technology offers an effective and non-invasive way to improve the appearance and health of the skin by utilizing sublimation to stimulate collagen production and rejuvenate the skin's surface.

🌟 🌟 Wondering How our Plasma device compares to Jet Plasma? Let Us Enlighten You! 🌟

At Blaze Needling, we often receive inquiries about how our device stacks up against Jet Plasma. Allow us to clarify the key differences and highlight why our multi-functional Plasma device reigns supreme.

🌪️ Jet Plasma: Not Cold Plasma, but Ozone Plasma 🌪️

While Jet Plasma produces ozone plasma, it's important to note that it is not synonymous with cold plasma. Cold plasma involves combining plasma with an inert gas, resulting in a gentle and effective skincare treatment. On the other hand, Jet Plasma solely produces ozone plasma, which is known for its sterilizing properties and calming effects on the skin. While beneficial for bacteria and sterilization, it lacks the comprehensive benefits that our device's seven plasma tips provide for skin rejuvenation.

✨ The Blaze Needling Advantage: 7 Tips, Limitless Possibilities! ✨

Now, let's delve into what sets us apart. Our innovative device boasts not just one, but a whopping seven different tips. Alongside our remarkable Ozone Plasma tip, we offer a range of thermal and non-thermal plasma options. This versatility allows you to customize your skincare routine and address specific concerns with ease.

💫 Unleash the Power of Ozone Plasma on Your Skin 💫

Our Ozone Plasma tip harnesses the incredible power of ozone, a highly reactive form of oxygen, to provide a multi-faceted approach to skin rejuvenation. Experience the calming and sterilizing effects on your skin, while also enjoying reduced fine lines, diminished wrinkles, and an overall improvement in skin health. It's a comprehensive solution that delivers exceptional results.

Knowledge is power! 

At Fusion Plasma Beverly Hills, we’ve searched high and low for a device that provides the best of both worlds - hot and cold plasma in one innovative package. We understand the importance of investing in the right technology for your business, which is why we want to shed light on what makes cold plasma truly effective.

Cold plasma technology is a cutting-edge solution that combines a plasma arc with an inert gas to achieve remarkable results. It’s crucial to note that claims of cold plasma without the use of an inert gas contradict scientific findings and industry consensus. Don’t be deceived by misleading claims that promise the same benefits without the necessary components.

We urge you to take the time to understand the science behind cold plasma. It requires the combination of a plasma arc with an inert gas to achieve the desired effects. Just google it. Knowledge is power! By doing so, you’ll be equipped with the knowledge to make an informed decision when investing in your business.

We prioritize scientific accuracy and integrity. We want to ensure that our customers receive the true power of cold plasma technology. So, when considering cold plasma products, be cautious of misleading claims and choose a company that values scientific accuracy.

Invest wisely, and let us help you unlock the full potential of cold plasma for your business. Together, we can achieve remarkable results and take your ventures to new heights! ✨💼
